subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The height-challenged and obscure Siena had taken a 4-point lead with 7 minutes 45 seconds remaining, and that is precisely when Louisville decided to take over.
snippet: The height-challenged and obscure Siena had taken a 4-point lead with 7 minutes 45 seconds remaining, and that is precisely when Louisville decided to take over.
